reviews.review: 我觉得真的很恶心，烂优化不是一次两次了 玩着屠夫莫名其妙一刀打下去给我画面定格了足足5秒 人都跑了15161615416548464公里了 每次不是翻窗就是刀后卡屏幕 恶心

Dead By Daylight was a once fun game, that unfortunately has been neglected by the devs and is just an abusive relationship at this point. The game was very fun before MMR came out, and now it's just filled with either extremely easy matches, or the sweatiest matches of your life. BHVR did 4 MMR tests and each time they did them, the community (including me and my friend group) did not like. But even after all those tests and complaints about MMR they still managed to release it as a full rank system. Wouldn't be so bad right? Wrong. It counts how many kills a killer gets and when you escape as a survivor. Doesn't count how you do in chase, or how you did as killer, but rather the immersed meg who leaves the guy who looped the whole game on first hook. It's not fun at all as survivor anymore, Every match I play I either get camped or tunneled because the killers have been mistreated so badly by MMR they have to play like this in order to do their objective. And I haven't even gotten to playing killer yet in this review. As killer, if you spend more than 30 fucking seconds chasing 1 survivor, all 5 gens pop instantly, or it's just an extremely unfair chase where you just get clicked and t-bagged at. I used to play this game non-stop for awhile but recently, I've been losing motivation to play it and honestly have been looking for a new game to play. Espieally after every recent killer that has been coming out. The Artist, Anti-Loop, The Cenobite, Anti-Loop, The Nemesis, Anti-Loop. And probably sadako the new chapter that has already been announced. The fun has just been slowly being drained from this game and it hurts to see BHVR neglect one of my most favorite games. I really hope VHS gives this game a run for its money, because maybe then BHVR will actually try to fix this game.

这款游戏是我在Steam里玩得最多小时的游戏。说实话，我从来都没想过我会喜欢玩这类型的游戏。可能是因为我不太喜欢现今的很多网游（LOL除外），特别是大逃杀类型的游戏，那都不是我的菜。刚开始玩的时候我以为这款游戏会被抛弃，可没想到会越做越好，令人玩得很上头，真香~

现在就让小弟来说说个人对这游戏喜欢和不喜欢的点吧，（PS：个人看法，不喜轻喷）：

个人喜欢的一些点：
1）游戏制造紧张的气氛做得不错，而且越来越好，QTE加上屠夫悄无声息地偷袭令我jumpscare了无数次。看实况主直播的时候jumpscare也很搞笑哈哈！
2）屠夫和幸存者的造型和性格都很鲜明，玩法也各有千秋。Silent Hill, A Night on Elm Street，和 Stranger Things的DLC真的做得很良心了，无论是屠夫还是幸存者都做得很棒。（技能不做评论，该buff的时候就会buff了。）
3）每局游戏的时间不长也不短，通常会在10 - 15 分钟内完成一局游戏，个人认为这游戏时长刚刚好。当然，也有不少在25 分钟以上的。但我真心希望你们很少玩到25分钟以上的一局游戏，具体就不解释了，玩过的读懂 (?)。不过比起以前有可能一局游戏能挂上个大半天，现在制作组真的在尽力减少没必要的游戏时长了。

个人不喜欢的一些点：
1） 皮肤好贵，而且有不少皮肤的质量给人的感觉就是没很认真在制作，以价格和质量来做比较的话，确实有很多皮肤不是很做得很良心。至少经常打打折嘛，每次想买皮肤的时候都得默默自己以快空空如也的钱包，含泪放弃了。
2） 屠夫和幸存者的玩法视角不一样，幸存者是第三人称视角，屠夫则是第一人称视角。这让玩习惯幸存者的我玩屠夫的时候很难受。而且不知道为什么，玩屠夫很容易头晕，不知道有没有其他人跟我有一样的感觉。我也经常玩FPS，除了视角做得不好的FPS会令我头晕目眩之外，我通常是不会有这个问题的。所以我不太确定屠夫的视角是不是做得不好。
3） 这个点其实跟第二有关联。相对于幸存者的第一视角操作能完全看到操纵角色的模型，屠夫是以第一视角来操作的，所以比赛的时候不会看到自己操纵的角色的模型。这让我个人认为买屠夫的皮肤非常地不实惠，虽然不在比赛的时候能看到皮肤，但是自己玩着的时候看不到自己买的皮肤，那倒不如不买。


以上是小弟个人对这游戏的一些看法，欢迎补充~

I got this game on free weekend and this game was the biggest surprise for me. I didn't think I'd like the game this much. All of the killers have their own unique features. Some of the survivors feel samey but overall they're pretty fun. If you like a casual game that requires some skill, this game is for you. Also if you main nurse and shred with her, you have my respect.

[ENG]
Beautiful game, both in company and alone. 10/10
muito bom jogo e ótimo para jogar com amigos
Jogo muito bom e divertido vicia rapido

É um jogo que diverte, especialmente se jogado em grupos de amigos. Tem aquele clima de suspense e dá para levar uns bons sustos e, apesar de não ser o tipo de jogo que vicia a ponto de ficar o dia inteiro jogando, é uma ótima aquisição. O único ponto negativo é os requisitos mínimos, pois se rodasse em computadores mais fracos, seria mais acessível a mais pessoas. Eu, mesmo com um i5 de 8GB e memória, jogo na pior resolução e isso definitivamente não me anima a jogar muitas partidas.

well this game used to be good, but with the addition of so many new perks, anyone who doesn't spend money, or  play religously isn't going to have fun. if your a new player, don't bother, you'll have to sink is years and hundreds of dollars just to get the point of having fun with a game that should be about killers having the advantage, but you don't unless you run very specific perks that are not only not on 1 killer, but are also on DLC killers meaning you have to buy them, or simply wait till the shrine gives has the perk.

(unpopular opinion but the sharing of perks between characters should be removed. "but that would make some killers/survivers bad" yes it would, but it would mean that those surviviers/killers could then get a buff/rework to make them better, instead of what we have where you have to spend money AND time just to have fun and not get fuck over at every turn. and we wouldn't have to worry about balancing perks with other perks that the killer doesn't normally have)

After a solid 10 minutes waiting to find a group I quit. Joining a group with other people is not a issue, wanting to be the killer is.

16年就跟风入了游戏却将其闲置至今，最近因身体原因赋闲在家，无聊到极致的时候想起了游戏库角落里它的身影，本来是想打发一下时间结果发现根本停不下来，肾上腺激素飙升的快感真的是让人瘾大啊。游戏可以说是捉迷藏的变种，但由“躲藏与搜寻”这一简单的人类游戏活动衍生出的玩法真的百玩不厌。暴走猫自摸咬根我就是蘑菇皇，这辈子是不可能呼吸道地面50厘米以上的空气了
很刺激但是不会溜。刚接触嘛。又菜又爱玩，一来人就慌，还是可以的 就是碰到大佬 彻底没戏，算是对新手很有考验。
Great game for horror fans. There are some bugs, glitches and not so good graphics but it still keeps the horror vibe as more content comes in.
Fantastic game full of jumpscares, and challenges. The team play dynamic provides for great times while strengthening bonds with friends. Must have game that I always have installed somewhere
